vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.35.18;
son of: Israel (H3478) and Rachel (H7354);
brother of: Joseph (H3130);
half-brother of: Reuben (H7205), Simeon (H8095), Levi (H3878), Judah (H3063), Dan (H1835H), Naphtali (H5321), Gad (H1410), Asher (H0836), Issachar (H3485), Zebulun (H2074) and Dinah (H1783);
father of: Bela (H1106A), Becher (H1071), Ashbel (H0788), Gera (H1617), Naaman (H5283), Ehi (H0278), Rosh (H7220), Muppim (H4649), Huppim (H2650H), Ard (H0714), Ahiram (H0297) and Jediael (H3043); also called Jamin at 1Sa.9.1,4; 22.7; 1x
Another spelling of bin.ya.min (בִּנְיָמִין "Benjamin" H1144)
§ Jaminites = see Jamin "the right hand"
the descendants of Jamin
vocabinfos._es_Definition: descendant de Jamín, hijo de Simeón \miembro de la tribu de Benjamín
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅憫族 这个形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 見 雅憫 "右手"
雅憫的後裔 (民 26:12)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
雅悯族 这个形容词在希伯来文的意思是 见 雅悯 "右手"
雅悯的后裔 (民 26:12)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Simeon living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.10;
son of: Simeon (H8095);
brother of: Jemuel (H3223), Ohad (H0161), Jachin (H3199), Zerah (H2226L) and Shaul (H7586H)
Group of ya.min (יָמִין "Jamin" H3226)
§ Jaminites = see Jamin "the right hand"
the descendants of Jamin
